attributes.additional_details:
Piers Morgan left the UK following the embarassment caused by publishing fictional stories about UK troops torturing Iraqis in the national press accompanied by fake photographs.

Following Piers Morgans out spoken comments on gun control in the USA, there is a growing movement to expel him from the USA and he may be forced to return to the UK.

We call on the Home Office to carry out its obligation to protect the public from terror, crime and anti-social behaviour and secure our borders by preventing Piers Morgan from re-entering the country.
